EXTRACTED VALUE: As long as you don't fall asleep at the wheel, Chrome Hounds offers a smattering of explosive action.
There's no feeling of being "unleashed," and the actual implementation of Force powers is drastically inferior to older games like Jedi Outcast.
I spend so much time criticizing this game only because the core mechanics are so good.
While the game is a fast and furious stylized shooter, one of the biggest faults the title has is with how muddy the controls feel.
